session.speaker: Andrew Knight
session.bio: Andrew Knight, also known as “Pandy,” is the Automation Panda. He's a software quality champion who loves to help people build better quality software. An avid supporter of open source software, Pandy is a Playwright Ambassador as well as the lead developer for Boa Constrictor, the .NET Screenplay Pattern. On the side, he is writing a book on software testing with Manning Publications. Check out his tech blog at AutomationPanda.com, follow him on Twitter at @AutomationPanda.
